comment.comment: VJ FIND - executes when a line in the activity VJ is clicked
used for the activity list filter

link.expressions.link.expressions: if (not (null(assign.dept in $File))) then $query+=" and assignment.groups=assign.dept in $File"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if (cost.currency.code in $L.file~=NULL and cost.currency.code in $L.file~="") then $query+=(" and currency.code#\""+cost.currency.code in $L.file+"\"")
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if (not (null(assign.dept in $File))) then $query+=" and name#assign.dept in $File"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if (not (null(assign.dept in $File))) then $query+=" and name=assign.dept in $File"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if (not (null(assign.dept in $File)) and not (null(denull($assignment.operators)))) then $query+=" and name isin $assignment.operators"
if (not (null(assigned.to in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#assigned.to in $File")
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
if (not (null(sc.operator in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+sc.operator in $File+"\"")

$L.folders={};for $L.y = 1 to lng(denull(folders in tableAccess in $G.cm3r.environment)) do (if (5 in $L.y in folders in tableAccess in $G.cm3r.environment~="never") then ($L.folders=$L.folders+{1 in $L.y in folders in tableAccess in $G.cm3r.environment}))
if (not (null(affected.services in $File))) then ($qry="logical.name=\""+cursor.line(1) in affected.services in $File+"\"") else ($qry="true")
if (not (null(affected.item in $File))) then $query+=(" and logical.name#\""+affected.item in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(change.owner in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#change.owner in $File")
if ($G.multi and not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=company in $File or company=\"DEFAULT\")"
$L.idx=nullsub(cursor.line(1), 1);if (not (null($L.idx in tcab.groups in $File))) then $query+=(" and name#\""+$L.idx in tcab.groups in $File+"\"")

post.expressions.post.expressions: if null(coordinator in $L.source) then (coordinator in $L.source=coordinator.change in $L.target)

javascript.post.javascript.post: //might need to get the document again here to refresh the data in the view
